---
title: computeHmac
icon: square-f
iconType: solid
---

> **참고**: 이 페이지는 아직 한국어로 번역되지 않았습니다. 아래는 영어 원문입니다.

```ts
function computeHmac(
   algorithm, 
   _key, 
   _data): string
```

Return the HMAC for `data` using the `key` key with the underlying `algo` used for compression.

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `algorithm` | `"sha256"` \| `"sha512"` | The algorithm to use for compression. |
| `_key` | [`BytesLike`](/ko/sdk/content/type-aliases/BytesLike) | The key to use for the HMAC. |
| `_data` | [`BytesLike`](/ko/sdk/content/type-aliases/BytesLike) | The data to authenticate. |

## Returns

`string`

The HMAC of the data.

## Example

```js
key = id('some-secret');

// Compute the HMAC
computeHmac('sha256', key, '0x1337');

// To compute the HMAC of UTF-8 data, the data must be
// converted to UTF-8 bytes
computeHmac('sha256', key, toUtf8Bytes('Hello World'));
```
